field.description: Determines whether safety analysis is required or not
field.name: Functional Safety Analysis Needed

field.description: Distinguishes the type of a requirement object.
field.name: Requirement Type

field.description: Quantifies the rate in percent how often an optional requirement object is selected by a customer across all sold units of a product. Relative alternative to "Volume Potential".
field.name: Take Rate

field.description: Used to track the correlating ADO (former TFS) ID
field.name: ADO ID

field.description: Individual text string which can be used to add individual information to a requirement object.
field.name: Tag

field.description: The requirement object is effective for the entered model type(s) of a product or system entity.
field.name: Model Series

field.description: Organizational area which requested the requirement object (e.g. CSP, CSE-PM).
field.name: Origin

field.description: Status of the user acceptance test of the requirement object.
field.name: User Acceptance Test

field.description: Manufacturing Cost in € which are expected for the requirement object.
field.name: Manufacturing Cost

field.description: Masterprice in € which is expected for the requirement object.
field.name: Masterprice

field.description: Determines whether security analysis is required or not
field.name: Cybersecurity Analysis Needed

field.description: Quantifies the expected sales volume in sold units (with regard to the the requirement object) per year. Absolute alternative to "Take Rate".
field.name: Volume Potential

field.description: Defines the type of influence on target architecture
field.name: Architectural Influence

field.description: Release in which this System Requirement is planned to be integrated.
field.name: Planned Release

field.description: Release in which this System Requirement is actually integrated.
field.name: Release

field.description: Select from the list of areas the area which belongs to the requirement.
field.name: Area Path

field.description: Individual text string which can be used to add individual information to a requirement object.
field.name: Tag 2

field.description: Type of test to verify/validate a requirement object.
field.name: Test Type

field.description: Voting information from supplier view on a requirement which is hand-over to an external supplier.
field.name: Supplier Status

field.description: Hardware Versions for which this requirement does apply.
field.name: Hardware Version

field.description: Defines the risk for the development project
field.name: Development Risk

field.description: Defines whether the feature should be bought or made
field.name: Make or Buy Recommendation

field.description: Specifies the relevant function(s) of the CLAAS Generic Function Structure.
field.name: Generic Function Structure

field.description: Specifies if the requirement is effective for all units of a product/system ("Series") or only in specific cases.
field.name: Variance

field.description: Textual justification why a requirement is necessary.
field.name: Rationale

field.description: Person, who is responsible to test the requirement object.
field.name: Test Responsible

field.description: Voting relevant supplier comment on a requirement which is hand-over to an external supplier.
field.name: Supplier Comment

field.description: Modules of the CLAAS Tractor Modulestructure which are allocated to/potentially impacted by the requirement.
field.name: Modulestructure CT

field.description: Defines if the Feature has external dependencies
field.name: External Dependency

field.description: Criteria used to verify/validate the requirement object.
field.name: Test Criteria

field.description: Voting information from customer view on a requirement which is hand-over to an external supplier.
field.name: CLAAS Status

field.description: Voting relevant customer com ment on a requirement which is hand-over to an external supplier.
field.name: CLAAS Comment

field.description: Complexity to test the requirement object.
field.name: Test Complexity

field.description: User who is responsible to define & manage the content of the requirement.
field.name: Responsible

field.description: Main groups of the CLAAS Masterstructure which are allocated to/potentially impacted by the requirement.
field.name: Masterstructure
